title: Boku Wa Tomodachi Ga Sukunai X Seitokai No Ichizon Crossover Special
alternative_title: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai + Seitokai no Ichizon Crossover ; Haganai x Seitokai ; Haganai x Seitokai Crossver
status: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai + Seitokai no Ichizon Crossover ; Haganai x Seitokai ; Haganai x Seitokai Crossver
description:
Description :
        The characters from both Haganai and Seitokai no Ichizon visit each others' clubroom in this two-part crossover. Strangely enough, the male protagonists from each manga do not make appearances.Chapter One:The Neighbor's Club gets a mysterious message from a certain student council! This chapter was drawn by Itachi, the artist of the Haganai manga.Chapter Two:The Hekiyou Gakuen student council receives an invitation from the Neighbor's Club to visit. This chapter was drawn by 10mo, the artist of the Seitokai no Ichizon manga.Related:> Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai(http://mangapark.com/search?q=boku-wa-tomodachi-ga-sukunai)> Seitokai no Ichizon(http://mangapark.com/search?q=seitokai-no-ichizon)
